user_input: Use the Joule Model. Use the split operation to divide Nuclear generators in france into 2 objects one in north one in south keep the object name length to 4 characters
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Joule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Read the Model object named 'Joule' to set the working context.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the correct Model object to set context to 'Joule'.

tasks.description: Split Generator objects in France with Fuel=Nuclear into exactly two objects per source, assigned to 'north' and 'south', enforcing a maximum object name length of 4 characters.

naming_scheme.base_name_rule: take first 3 alphanumerics of source name; append suffix; if shorter than 4, pad with last available alphanumeric; if collision, replace last char with 0-9

tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', identify the Generator objects in France with Fuel=Nuclear to serve as the split source, and ensure outputs reflect 'north' and 'south'.
